about_the_game:
Collect quadrillion of coins, hatch pets to mine for you, and unlock 100 unique hand-crafted areas!
An incremental clicker/idle creatures-collection adventure.
Dopamine heaven has arrived!


First Steps version includes the early areas from the full game.

Features:
  • Mine coins (yes, it's as fun as it looks)!
  • Unlock a huge variety of hand-crafted areas!
  • Hatch new pets to automatically mine coins for you!
  • Collect the rarest pets and discover rare variations like Gold, Rainbow, Mega, and Omega!
  • Tons of random events to make mining exciting, from ice cubes to dragons - anything is possible!
  • Find, buy, and craft many upgrades for you and your pets!
  • Ascend every 25 areas to become even stronger!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050-TI or AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Can someone please tell my brain that collecting a quintillion gold coins is not humanly possible? But here I am, hours in, tirelessly mining pixels for a goal that literally can't be reached. Plot twist: it's just a demo! The game stops, my addiction doesn’t. I’m convinced the developers have mastered some kind of mind control. My entire life now revolves around chasing digital gold like it’s the fountain of youth, even though the last level is essentially a mirage. 10/10 would recommend – for anyone looking to ruin their sleep schedule!”
☢️💤
